typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as integer,
		Rating as integer,
		{Rotton Tomato} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> moviesCSV
moviesCSV derive(movies = @(title=title,
		genres=split(genres,'|'),
		year=year,
		rating=Rating)) ~> MakeHierarchy
MakeHierarchy aggregate(groupBy(moviegrp = movie),
	id = first(movie),
		movies = first(movies),
		titlekey = first(title)) ~> Dedupe
Dedupe sink(input(
		movies as (year as string, genres as string[], rating as string, title as string),
		titlekey as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'document',
	partitionKey: ['/titlekey'],
	throughput: 2000) ~> loadCosmos
